code: var get=function get(key,defaultValue){var localStorageData=localStorage.getItem(key);if(localStorageData===null){return defaultValue;}else{return JSON.parse(localStorageData);}};var set=function set(key,value){var localStorageData=JSON.stringify(value);localStorage.setItem(key,localStorageData);};var remove=function remove(key){localStorage.removeItem(key);};var clear=function clear(){localStorage.clear();};var objectToExport={get:get,set:set,remove:remove,clear:clear};export default objectToExport;
